mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.`name`, u.description, u.avatar, COUNT(a.id) AS article_sum FROM `user` AS u JOIN `article` AS a ON u.id = a.user_id GROUP BY u.id, u.`name`, u.description, u.avatar ORDER BY article_sum DESC LIMIT 0, 5;

SELECT a.id, a.featured_pic, a.title, a.summary, a.content, a.article_group_id, u.id AS user_id, u.`name` AS author, u.`avatar`, c.category_name AS category, c.id AS category_id, a.tag, g.name AS article_group_name, a.`status`, a.`pv_count`, (SELECT count(*) FROM article_thumb WHERE article_id = a.id) AS `like_count`, (SELECT count(*) FROM collection_article WHERE article_id = a.id) AS `collection_count`, (SELECT count(*) FROM comment_article WHERE article_id = a.id) AS `comment_count`, a.`created_time`, a.`publish_time`, a.`update_time` FROM article AS a JOIN `user` AS u ON a.user_id = u.id JOIN category AS c ON a.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN group_article AS g ON a.article_group_id = g.id
${ew.customSqlSegment} AND a.is_deleted = 0
WHERE a.is_deleted = 0
ORDER BY a.update_time DESC
